descriptionHtml:
Adds a bosmer archer as a follower to Candlehearth Hall in Windhelm. dont think there is any bosmer follower in default game aside from Faendal.

Comes with all \'features\' of a default companion. Idle\'s where you dismiss her. Essential, auto level etc.

Lore-wise, probably a bad idea to put her in Windhelm lol. but i have yet to see any lore friendly companions anyway.

you can make your own background story

------------------

INSTALL
Drop .bsa and .esp into Data folder
-Put at bottom of load list

------------------

Required mods
ApachiiSkyHair 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

Recommended mods

You will need these also to replicate my uploaded image:

Coverwomen by MrLenski (any)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563
Covereyes by MrLenski (any)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869
DIMONIZED UNP female body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709
Black Tower and Black Sacrament Armor Pack
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5696

------------------
Creds to above for their awesome textures and meshes
author: YellowPaint
